definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: For proper combustion it is necessary to atomize the propellants.
sentences.chinese: 爲了有效地進行燃燒，推進劑必須霧化。

sentences.english: A mechanical model of the uniaxial extension of composite solid propellants is propounded in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了複合固體推進劑單向拉伸力學模型。

sentences.english: The influences of the agglomerated boron to the processing of boron-based fuel-rich propellants were studied.
sentences.chinese: 詳細研究聚團硼對含硼富燃推進劑工藝的影響。

sentences.english: The result shows that there is still a portion of propellant un-ignited in the front of SRM.
sentences.chinese: 計算結果顯示，發動機頭部有一部分推進劑未點燃。

sentences.english: Acceptance testing equipment for production of liquid propellant.
sentences.chinese: 生產液體推進劑用的驗收試驗設備。

sentences.english: Upon vehicle impact, a pyrotechnic propellant charge is ignited electrically.
sentences.chinese: 車輛發生碰撞時，電子點燃焰火式推進劑填料。

sentences.english: Composite solid propellant slurry is a viscous fluid with high percentage of solid particles.
sentences.chinese: 複合固體推進劑藥漿是固體粒子含量很高的粘性流體。

sentences.english: Other advantages of the propellent with a negative pressure exponent were also presented.
sentences.chinese: 還指出了負壓力指數推進劑的其它優點。

sentences.english: The combustion mechanism of boron-based fuel-rich propellant was studied.
sentences.chinese: 含硼富燃推進劑燃燒機理研究。

sentences.english: It is reasonable that this result should be generally applicable also to liquid-propellant rockets.
sentences.chinese: 這個結果通常也應適用於液體推進劑火箭。

sentences.english: For ammonium perchlorate based propellants, it is usually the former.
sentences.chinese: 爲高氯酸銨爲基礎的推進劑，它通常是前者。

sentences.english: Liquid oxygen and alcohol were used as the propellant.
sentences.chinese: 液氧和酒精被用作推進劑。

sentences.english: The main components of the solid propellant are nitrocellulose and nitroglycerin.
sentences.chinese: 固體推進劑的主要成分爲硝化棉和硝化甘油。

sentences.english: Launch capability of liquid rocket engine can be improved by propellant utilization system.
sentences.chinese: 採用推進劑利用系統可以提高運載火箭的發射能力。

sentences.english: Theoretical analysis on combustion residue of magnesium-aluminum fuel-rich propellant;
sentences.chinese: 系統研究了鋁鎂貧氧推進劑低壓燃燒特性的表徵方法。

sentences.english: Another major test is how to consume the least possible propellant while achieving rendezvous and docking.
sentences.chinese: 如何消耗最少的推進劑完成交會對接，也是重大考驗。
